page.title: 14THE GEORGE LAWTON HALL
page.content: The George Lawton Hall was built on land on Stamford Street which formerly held a mill.It could be considered the main entertainment centre in Mossley. It is available for theatre productions, dancing, receptions and a great number of indoor sports.Mossley A.O.D.S. hold several productions each year. During the week many activities take place such as Karate, gymnastics and table tennis. A Disco for young people is held every Tuesday evening. During school holidays play schemes are often held. A recent extension has increased the size of the stage and now more lavish sets can be built on stage.
